attacks.name: Spiral Leaf
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokemon. If tails, remove 1 damage country for each of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Time Trap
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, look at the top 4 cards of your opponent's deck, and put them back on top of your opponent's deck in any order. If tails, look at the top 4 cards of your deck, and put them back on top of your deck in any order.
